brian eno - by this river

By brian eno

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brian_Eno

    C
Here we are
C
Stuck by this river,
Am
You and I
Am
Underneath a sky that's ever falling
F
down, down, down
               Am
Ever falling down.

C
Through the day
C
As if on an ocean
Am
Waiting here,
Am
Always failing to remember why we
F
  came, came, came:
               Am
I wonder why we came.

C
You talk to me
C
as if from a distance
Am
And I reply
Am
With impressions chosen from another
F
  time, time, time,
                Am
From another time.
